measurelib module¶

Various convenience functions for measurements on a quantum computer or wavefunction simulator

vqe.measurelib.append_measure_register(program, qubits=None, trials=10)¶

Creates readout register, MEASURE instructions for register and wraps in trials trials.

Parameters

  • param qubits (list) – List of Qubits to measure. If None, program.get_qubits() is used

  • param trials (int) – The number of trials to run.

Returns

program with the measure instructions appended

Return type

Program

vqe.measurelib.hamiltonian_expectation_value(hamiltonian, bitstrings)¶

Calculates the energy expectation value of bitstrings w.r.t ham.

Parameters

  • param hamiltonian (PauliSum) – The hamiltonian

  • param bitstrings (2D arry or list) – the measurement outcomes. Columns are outcomes for one qubit.

Returns

Return type

tuple (expectation_value, standard_deviation)

Warning

Only handles hamiltonians that are sums of products of Zs!
